name: BMM_FUNCTION
documentation: A formal element with signature of the form: `name ({arg:TArg}*):TResult`. A function is a computed (rather than data) element, generally assumed to be non-state-changing.

operator_definition.name: operator_definition
operator_definition.documentation: Optional details enabling a function to be represented as an operator in a syntactic representation.

result.name: result
result.documentation: Automatically created Result variable, usable in body and post-condition.
